title: The Orchard: Claim Me
description: [Siren Allure: Erotic Consensual BDSM Romance, with M/F/M elements, voyeurism, spanking, paddling, cropping, flogging, sex toys, HFN] Kellie has come to The Orchard, a BDSM club, to find a little adventure. She gets that and much more when she is paired with Master Jesse. Kellie soon realizes that she not only wants this Dom to claim her as his own, she needs it. Master Jesse is just looking for fun with this new sub. After the last catastrophe, he promised himself he would never take a sub on long-term. His new little one takes him off guard, however. Master Jesse finds himself attached, whether he likes it or not. Can he continue to fight himself and release Kellie? The Orchard holds parties. Some are planned out and others are casual but all are BDSM. The more parties that Master Jesse brings Kellie to, the harder it is to let her go. He can see that Kellie desperately wants to be necklaced, a sign at The Orchard that a sub is owned. Master Jesse just can't bring himself to give his necklace away, again. ** A Siren Erotic Romance
author: Mackenzie Williams
